title: THE ONE (LIKIT RAK KAD JAI MAE) [Thai Movie]

Synopsis:

Viyada was widowed when her son Tonkla was still a baby. She worked as a diplomat and they traveled a lot. When Tonkla grew up Viyada decided to settle in Bangkok so her son can enter one of prestigious English speaking universities. Tonkla contradicted her and enrolled to study engineering in university upcountry. Tonkla had no idea what he wanted to do with his life when he met Tid who studied law. Tid had a clear purpose, to graduate and go back to help his hometown. Waddao is a girl with a goal to better rural agriculture. Her friend Seubsai a closet transsexual also agriculture students was following her ideal. Seubsai confided in Waddao that he liked Tonkla but Rarin, the most popular girl on the campus liked Tonkla too.
